resources.string: Dear customer, we at Bengaluru duty free shop are conducting a survey to increase the quality of services provided to you. Kindly take this survey and help us in rendering the best service to you.
1.What is the purpose of your travel?
2.What is the frequency of your travel in a year?
3.Were you aware of the Duty Free shop in this airport?
5.If we offer you the following product categories â€“ would you consider purchasing ?What is the purpose of your travel?
7.How would you rate your experience of Duty free Store,Bangalore against your favorite Duty Free
8.How would you rate your experience in this airport at;(on scale of 1 to 5, 1 being least and 5 being most satisfied your experience at)
Thank you for your valuable feedback.
